name: sync::rwmutex::RwMutexWriteGuard::<'a, T>::downgrade

sync::rwmutex::RwMutexWriteGuard::<'a, T.doc:
This is not exposed as a public method to prevent intermediate lock states from affecting the
 downgrade process.

Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 7113, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 5882, name: "sync::rwmutex::RwMutexUpgradeableGuard" }), GenericArgs([Lifetime(Region { kind: ReErased }), Type(Ty { id: 38, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 1, name: "T" }) })]))) })])

doc:
Atomically downgrades a write guard to an upgradeable reader guard.

 This method always succeeds because the lock is exclusively held by the writer.
